forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
The day in Downtown San Francisco unfolds beneath a brilliant sun, painting the city in soft hues and inviting warmth. Current temperatures hover comfortably around sixty degrees, gradually easing into the afternoon with a gentle fall to fifty-eight. The sky is a canvas of blue, underscored by wispy clouds that seem to lazily drift, teasingly flirting with the iconic vistas that define this urban oasis. Though the air carries whispers of briskness—courtesy of a subtle south-southwest breeze—there’s a certain clarity today that promises cheerful exploration.

As evening approaches, a shift will begin, with temperatures dipping into the cool embrace of the mid-forties. Partly cloudy skies will offer a cozy backdrop, ideal for quiet strolls along Pier 39 or perhaps an intimate coffee at one of the hidden cafés lining the streets of North Beach. For those venturing out, layering is advised; a light jacket over casual attire will provide both style and comfort as the twilight settles in. Given the lack of significant fog and the pleasant conditions, today is a perfect opportunity to enjoy the splendid architecture that San Francisco has to offer, perhaps wandering through the Mission District, soaking in the vibrant murals that tell tales of a rich cultural tapestry.
